name: Expand Borders ω
text: Control 6 planets outside of your home system.

name: Found Research Outposts ω
text: Control 2 planets that have technology specialties and spend 2 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Intimidate the Council ω
text: Have ships in the Mecatol Rex system, or in 2 systems that are adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system.

name: Bestow an Imperial Fleet ω
text: Remove 1 of each of your carriers, cruisers, and destroyers from the game board.

name: Impose Order ω
text: Have non-fighter ships in 3 systems that contain a structure.

name: Monopolize a Trade Route ω
text: Have ships in 2 systems that each contain a non-delta wormhole of the same type.

name: Study the Unknown ω
text: Have ships in 4 systems that contain or are adjacent to an anomaly.

name: Form a Galactic Brain Trust ω
text: Control 4 planets that have technology specialties.

name: Patrol Vast Territories ω
text: Have units in 4 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Protect the Border ω
text: Have structures on 4 planets outside of your home system.

name: Subdue the Galaxy ω
text: Control 10 planets outside of your home system.

name: Unify the Colonies ω
text: Control 5 planets that each have the same planet trait.

name: Establish an Imperial Navy ω
text: Remove 2 of each of your carriers, cruisers, and destroyers from the game board.

name: Dominate Cities ω
text: Have non-fighter ships in 5 systems that contain a structure.

name: Declare Victory ω
text: Control 2 planets outside of your home system with a resource or influence value of at least 4.

name: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos ω
text: Have units in 7 systems that contain or are adjacent to an anomaly.
